title: Multiplication & Division Basics
subject: Math
description: Build a strong foundation in multiplication and division through hands-on activities and real-world problems.

title: Fractions & Decimals
subject: Math
description: Master fractions, decimals, and their operations. Includes visual models and word problems.

title: Pre-Algebra Foundations
subject: Math
description: Introduction to variables, expressions, and basic equations. Bridge from arithmetic to algebra.

title: Pre-Algebra
subject: Math
description: Comprehensive pre-algebra covering integers, rational numbers, proportions, and linear equations.

title: Algebra I
subject: Math
description: First-year algebra: linear equations, inequalities, polynomials, and quadratic functions.

title: Geometry
subject: Math
description: Euclidean geometry with proofs, constructions, area, volume, and coordinate geometry.

title: Nature & Life Science
subject: Science
description: Explore plants, animals, habitats, and the water cycle through observation and experiments.

title: Earth Science
subject: Science
description: Study rocks, minerals, weather, and Earth's systems. Includes geology lab activities.

title: Life Science
subject: Science
description: Cell biology, genetics, evolution, and ecology. Lab-based learning with microscope work.

title: Physical Science Lab
subject: Science
description: Hands-on exploration of forces, motion, energy, and simple machines. Heavy lab component.

title: Physical Science
subject: Science
description: Introduction to physics and chemistry concepts: matter, energy, forces, and chemical reactions.

title: Biology
subject: Science
description: Comprehensive biology: molecular biology, genetics, evolution, ecology, and human anatomy.

title: Reading Comprehension
subject: English
description: Develop reading fluency and comprehension through diverse texts and guided reading strategies.

title: Creative Writing
subject: English
description: Express ideas through stories, poems, and journals. Focus on imagination and writing mechanics.

title: Grammar & Composition
subject: English
description: Master grammar rules, sentence structure, and paragraph writing. Build strong composition skills.

title: Literature Analysis
subject: English
description: Analyze fiction and nonfiction texts for theme, character, and literary devices.

title: Essay Writing
subject: English
description: Learn persuasive, expository, and narrative essay writing with research skills.

title: American Literature
subject: English
description: Survey of American literature from colonial period to modern era with critical analysis.

title: Community & Geography
subject: History
description: Learn about communities, maps, and basic geography through projects and exploration.

title: US History I
subject: History
description: American history from indigenous peoples through the Civil War. Primary source analysis.

title: World History I
subject: History
description: Ancient civilizations through the Renaissance. Focus on cultural connections and trade.

title: US Government
subject: History
description: The Constitution, branches of government, civic responsibility, and current events.

title: World History II
subject: History
description: From the Enlightenment to the modern era. Industrialization, world wars, and globalization.

title: Drawing Fundamentals
subject: Art
description: Learn basic drawing techniques: line, shape, shading, and perspective.

title: Painting & Color Theory
subject: Art
description: Explore watercolor and acrylic painting. Study color mixing, composition, and art history.

title: Digital Art Basics
subject: Art
description: Introduction to digital illustration and graphic design using free software tools.

title: Music Appreciation
subject: Art
description: Explore musical genres, instruments, and music history. Includes listening exercises.

title: Movement & Fitness
subject: PE
description: Fun physical activities, coordination exercises, and basic fitness concepts.

title: Sports & Fitness
subject: PE
description: Team sports, individual fitness plans, and health education.

title: Health & Wellness
subject: PE
description: Comprehensive health education covering nutrition, mental health, fitness planning, and first aid.
